data.title: Worldwide Tax Summaries Online
data.meta_description: PwC World Wide Tax Summaries, WWTS helps external client users to get up-to-date summary of basic information about corporate tax and individual taxes in over 150 countries worldwide.
data.text:
An interesting case was filed challenging Belgium's Pillar 2 legislation that targets, in particular, the Undertaxed Profits Rule. And as the EU Commission’s evaluation on the Directive onAdministrative Co-operation (DAC) comes to a close, another public consultation opens with a call for evidence on the operation of the EU Anti-Tax Avoidance Directive (ATAD). Finally, some major tax reform news out of Argentina. Watch Global Tax Talk every week for the latest on global tax policy developments so that you stay global tax ready. READ PWC’S TAX INSIGHT ON ARGENTINA’S TAX REFORM https://www.pwc.com/us/en/services/tax/library/argentina-adopts-new-promotional-regime-for-large-investments.html SUBSCRIBE TO GLOBAL TAX TALK https://cloud.email.pwc.com/global-tax-talk CONTACT THE GLOBAL TAX TALK TEAM gbl_tax_talk@pwc.com

India’s 2024 federal budget included a proposal to repeal its 2% equalisation levy. What are the implications for Pillar One? The G20 also met in Brazil and the UN published a “revised” draft termsof reference for the UN Tax Convention, which will inform upcoming discussions. Watch Global Tax Talk every week for the latest on global tax policy developments so that you stay global tax ready. SUBSCRIBE TO GLOBAL TAX TALK https://cloud.email.pwc.com/global-tax-talk CONTACT THE GLOBAL TAX TALK TEAM gbl_tax_talk@pwc.com

A mid-year look at tax policy trends in the European Union—rapidly expanding compliance burdens, some simplification measures, and Member States’ desire for more tax revenue while still attractinginvestment. IN THIS EPISODE Edwin Visser, Deputy Global Tax Policy Leader and EMEA Tax Policy Leader, PwC Netherlands Keetie van der Torren-Jakma, Director, Tax Policy, PwC Netherlands Chloe Fox, Director, Tax Policy Co-Driver, PwC Ireland SUBSCRIBE TO GLOBAL TAX TALK https://cloud.email.pwc.com/global-tax-talk
